[If, [StrLength, CONTROLSPATH ] > 0, // THEN
	[ISubPalette, [StrMerge, PLUGINNENU, ":", TESTINGSUBMENU ]]]


[IButton,  [StrMerge, CONTROLSTEST, "Get Tool Size"], "Get Tool Size",
	//[RoutineCall, copySouceObjectAndDecimate]

	[VarSet, maxSize, 0]

	[RoutineCall, getBboxMaxSize,  maxSize]

	/* GET TOOL SIZE IN MILIMETERS */
	[VarSet, milimetersSize, [IGet, Tool:Export:scale] * maxSize  ]

	[Note,
		[StrMerge, "Total max size of all subtoools:\n\n", milimetersSize, "mm"]

	 ,, 0]

,/*Disabled*/, 190 ,/*Hotkey*/,/*Icon*/, 32]


[IButton,  [StrMerge, CONTROLSTEST, "Mask By Cavity"], "Append Box scaled by tool in substraction mode",
	[RoutineCall, maskByCavity]
,/*Disabled*/, 190/2 ,/*Hotkey*/,/*Icon*/, 32]


[IButton,  [StrMerge, CONTROLSTEST, "Slicer Box"], "Append Box scaled by tool in substraction mode",
	[RoutineCall, appendSlicerBox]
,/*Disabled*/, 190/2 ,/*Hotkey*/,/*Icon*/, 32]




[IButton,  [StrMerge, CONTROLSTEST, "CREATE TEST SCENE"], "",


	[IKeyPress, 78,[IPress, Document:New Document]]


	//
	//[VarSet, tool_name_full, [StrMerge, "Tool:", "Sphere3D"]]
	//
	//
	//[IPress,Tool:SimpleBrush]
	//
	//
	//[IPress, [Var, tool_name_full] ]
	//[IPress,Tool:Gear3D]
	[IPress,Tool:Sphere3D]


	[CanvasStroke,()]

	[IPress,Transform: Edit]

	[IPress,Tool:Make PolyMesh3D]


	[ISet,Tool:Export:Scale, 10]


	[IPress,Transform:Fit]

	[IPress,Transform: Pf]

	[ISet, [StrMerge, CONTROLSPATH,"Thickness"], 3 ]


	//[IPress,Tool:Make PolyMesh3D]
	[IShow,Tool][IClick, Tool:SubTool,  1 ] // open menu

,/*Disabled*/, 190 ,/*Hotkey*/,/*Icon*/,48]



[IButton,  [StrMerge, CONTROLSTEST, "HOTKEY REQUIRED continue after decimation"], "Continue after decimation\n\nTHIS BUTTON MUST HOKEY ASSIGNED\n\nCTRL+SHift+F7",

	[RoutineCall, zRemeshSubtool]
	[RoutineCall, extractShell]
	[RoutineCall, liveBooleanOn]

	[IPress,Tool:SubTool:V1]

,/*Disabled*/, 190 ,  /*Hotkey*/,/*Icon*/,32]
